Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Future , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Loki starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
DUPLICATION CASTING: Shape Change. When Loki uses it, after resolutions you may place Loki a number of squares away from his current square equal to the d6 result.

May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
I said I liked him better at the lower line, but now that I’m looking at him… well, everyone likes the Shape Change/Super Senses combo. Having it, I mean, not facing it. No one likes facing it. It’s that ten attack; it just doesn’t make him as threatening as he needs to be. He really needs to wait until the tempo is right before he jumps into the fray and hopes his Shape Change can warp him around. 35 points is just barely cheap enough for him to do that, but a lot of the other figures in that point range in this set are doing other useful things while they wait.
May 2, 2022
Goop
So i like him a lot better on this line as a tie up piece now having super senses. A 35pt prob piece that is hard to kill and can do some decent damage too.
